DisplayName.value: Ghussak - Monster Essences (WIP: not everything was moved to here yet, it still depends on main Tweaks mod)

Description.value:
What transformed them can transform you too, but instead of the uncontrolled infections that happens in a crazy pandemy, it is like the controlled effects of a vaccine or some medicine that when properly used can improve you.
DEPENDENCIES: Modlets: GSKmeleeBuild: for the vampire power
